languages.text: Кассия Орселлио погибла на Эпитафии, и гибель ее стала концом для ее благородного Дома. Перед смертью, мучимая страхом и горем, она исторгла столь отчаянный крик, что его услышал каждый навигатор ее крови. Зайдясь в ответном вопле, все они моментально утратили разум и обратились в омерзительных чудовищ. Дом Орселлио пал, и обитателей его погребли обломки.

Cassia Orsellio died on Epitaph, and her death became the undoing of her noble House. In her last moments, tormented by fear and sorrow, she let out a scream so full of despair that every Navigator of her bloodline heard it. Echoing her cry, they all lost their minds in that instant and became loathsome monstrosities. House Orsellio fell, and its inhabitants were buried in the ruins.
languages.original_text: Кассия Орселлио погибла на Эпитафии, и гибель ее стала концом для ее благородного Дома. Перед смертью, мучимая страхом и горем, она исторгла столь отчаянный крик, что его услышал каждый навигатор ее крови. Зайдясь в ответном вопле, все они моментально утратили разум и обратились в омерзительных чудовищ. Дом Орселлио пал, и обитателей его погребли обломки.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio died on Epitaph, and her death became the undoing of the noble house. In her last moments, tormented by fear and sorrow, she let out a scream so full of despair, that every Navigator of her blood heard it. Echoing her cry, all of them forgone their minds at that instant and turned into loathsome monstrosities. House Orsellio had fallen, and its inhabitants got buried under its wreckage.

languages.text: 卡西娅·奥赛罗死在了荒垄碑碣，她的死导致了整个家族的覆灭。在生命的最后时刻，她被恐惧与悲伤所折磨，发出了绝望的尖叫。家族之中的每位导航者都听到了那声呼喊，在那一刻同时失去了理智，变成了可憎的怪物。奥赛罗家族覆灭了，家族的所有成员也在一片废墟之中消亡。
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio died on Epitaph, and her death became the undoing of her noble House. In her last moments, tormented by fear and sorrow, she let out a scream so full of despair that every Navigator of her bloodline heard it. Echoing her cry, they all lost their minds in that instant and became loathsome monstrosities. House Orsellio fell, and its inhabitants were buried in the ruins.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅·奥塞罗死在了荒垄碑碣，她的死导致了整个家族的覆灭。在生命的最后时刻，她被恐惧与悲伤所折磨，发出了绝望的尖叫。家族之中的每位导航者都听到了那声呼喊，在那一刻同时失去了理智，变成了可憎的怪物。奥塞罗家族覆灭了，家族的所有成员也随之消亡。

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio starb auf Epitaph, und ihr Tod sollte das Ende ihres Adelshauses bedeuten. In ihren letzten Augenblicken, von Angst und Trauer überwältigt, stieß sie einen derart verzweifelten Schrei aus, dass jeder Navigator ihres Hauses ihn vernahm. Sie fielen in ihren Schrei ein und verloren in diesem Augenblick allesamt den Verstand und wurden zu abscheulichen Monstern. Das Haus Orsellio brach zusammen und begrub seine Bewohner unter sich.
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio died on Epitaph, and her death became the undoing of her noble House. In her last moments, tormented by fear and sorrow, she let out a scream so full of despair that every Navigator of her bloodline heard it. Echoing her cry, they all lost their minds in that instant and became loathsome monstrosities. House Orsellio fell, and its inhabitants were buried in the ruins.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio starb auf Epitaph, und ihr Tod sollte das Ende ihres Adelshauses bedeuten. In ihren letzten Augenblicken, von Angst und Trauer überwältigt, stieß sie einen derart verzweifelten Schrei aus, dass jeder Navigator ihres Hauses ihn vernahm. Sie fielen in ihren Schrei ein und verloren in diesem Augenblick allesamt den Verstand und wurden zu abscheulichen Monstern. Das Haus Orsellio brach zusammen und begrub seine Bewohner unter sich.

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio périt sur Épitaphe, et sa mort entraîna la chute de sa noble maison. Dans ses derniers instants, tourmentée par la peur et le chagrin, elle poussa un hurlement plein d'un tel désespoir qu'il ébranla tous les navigateurs de sa lignée. En écho à son cri, chacun d'eux perdit instantanément la raison et se transforma en une abominable monstruosité. C'est ainsi que s'effondra la maison Orsellio, dans les ruines de laquelle furent ensevelis tous ses membres.
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio died on Epitaph, and her death became the undoing of her noble House. In her last moments, tormented by fear and sorrow, she let out a scream so full of despair that every Navigator of her bloodline heard it. Echoing her cry, they all lost their minds in that instant and became loathsome monstrosities. House Orsellio fell, and its inhabitants were buried in the ruins.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio périt sur Épitaphe et sa mort entraîna la chute de sa noble maison. Dans ses derniers instants, tourmentée par la peur et le chagrin, elle poussa un hurlement plein d'un tel désespoir qu'il ébranla tous les navigateurs de sa lignée. En écho à son cri, chacun d'eux perdit instantanément la raison et se transforma en une abominable monstruosité. C'est ainsi que s'effondra la maison Orsellio, dont tous les membres furent peu après enterrés.

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio murió en Epitafio, y su noble casa murió con ella. En sus últimos momentos, atormentada por el miedo y el dolor, emitió un grito tan cargado de desesperación que todos los Navegantes de su sangre lo oyeron. Se hicieron eco de él y, en ese instante, perdieron la cordura y se convirtieron en terribles monstruosidades. La casa Orsellio colapsó y todos sus miembros acabaron enterrados bajo sus ruinas.
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio died on Epitaph, and her death became the undoing of her noble House. In her last moments, tormented by fear and sorrow, she let out a scream so full of despair that every Navigator of her bloodline heard it. Echoing her cry, they all lost their minds in that instant and became loathsome monstrosities. House Orsellio fell, and its inhabitants were buried in the ruins.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio murió en Epitafio, y su noble casa murió con ella. En sus últimos momentos, atormentada por el miedo y el dolor, emitió un grito tan cargado de desesperación que todos los Navegantes de su sangre lo oyeron. Se hicieron eco de él y, en ese instante, perdieron la cordura y se convirtieron en terribles monstruosidades. La casa Orsellio colapsó y todos sus habitantes cayeron con ella.

languages.text: カシア・オーセリオはエピタフで息絶え、名家は彼女の死をもって解体の憂き目を見た。今際の際に、恐怖と悲しみにあえぐ彼女は絶望に満ちた雄叫びをあげ、一族の航宙士がそろってそれを耳にした。彼女の絶叫と共鳴するかのように、航宙士たちはその瞬間、ことごとく正気を失い、忌まわしき怪物へと姿を変えた。オーセリオ家は崩壊し、家人は瓦礫に葬られた。
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio died on Epitaph, and her death became the undoing of her noble House. In her last moments, tormented by fear and sorrow, she let out a scream so full of despair that every Navigator of her bloodline heard it. Echoing her cry, they all lost their minds in that instant and became loathsome monstrosities. House Orsellio fell, and its inhabitants were buried in the ruins.

traits.locale_text: カシア・オーセリオはエピタフで息絶え、名家は彼女の死をもって解体の憂き目を見た。今際の際に、恐怖と悲しみにあえぐ彼女は絶望に満ちた雄叫びをあげ、一族の航宙士がそろってそれを耳にした。彼女の絶叫と共鳴するかのように、航宙士たちはその瞬間、ことごとく正気を失い、忌まわしき怪物へと姿を変えた。オーセリオ家は崩壊し、家人は瓦礫に葬られた。

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio, Sinyazıt'ta öldü. Ölümü, soylu Hanesinin de sonu anlamına geldi. Son anları öylesine korku ve hüzün doluydu, öylesine ümitsizlik taşan bir çığlık kopardı ki onunla aynı soydan gelen tüm Rotacılar, o çığlığı duydu. Yankılanan sesi, bir anda akıllarını yitirmelerine ve iğrenç yaratıklara dönüşmelerine yol açtı. Orsellio Hanesi düştü, mensupları da yıkıntılarının altına gömüldü.
languages.original_text: Cassia Orsellio died on Epitaph, and her death became the undoing of her noble House. In her last moments, tormented by fear and sorrow, she let out a scream so full of despair that every Navigator of her bloodline heard it. Echoing her cry, they all lost their minds in that instant and became loathsome monstrosities. House Orsellio fell, and its inhabitants were buried in the ruins.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio, Kitabe'de öldü ve ölümü, soylu Hane'sinin de sonu anlamına geldi. Son anları öylesine korku ve hüzün doluydu ve öylesine ümitsizlik taşan bir çığlık kopardı ki, onunla aynı soydan gelen tüm Rotacılar o çığlığı duydu. Yankılanan sesi, bir anda akıllarını yitirmelerine ve iğrenç yaratıklara dönüşmelerine yol açtı. Orsellio Hanesi düştü ve üyeleri de yıkıntılarının altına gömüldü.
